info.title: Anything Client
info.description: Service client for testing basic anything types. Those schemas without types can be anything:  primitive, object, array.

get.description: Basic get that returns an object as anything. Returns object { 'message': 'An object was successfully returned' }

200.description: Returns object { 'message': 'An object was successfully returned' }

put.description: Basic put that puts an object as anything. Pass in {'foo': 'bar'} to get a 200 and anything else to get an object error.

parameters.name: putObject
parameters.description: Pass in {'foo': 'bar'} for a 200, anything else for an object error

get.description: Basic get that returns an string as anything. Returns string 'anything'

200.description: Returns object { 'message': 'An object was successfully returned' }

put.description: Basic put that puts an string as anything. Pass in 'anything' to get a 200 and anything else to get an object error.

parameters.name: putObject
parameters.description: Pass in {'foo': 'bar'} for a 200, anything else for an object error

get.description: Basic get that returns an array as anything. Returns string ['foo', 'bar']

200.description: Returns object { 'message': 'An object was successfully returned' }

put.description: Basic put that puts an array as anything. Pass in ['foo', 'bar'] to get a 200 and anything else to get an object error.

parameters.name: putObject
parameters.description: Pass in ['foo', 'bar'] for a 200, anything else for an object error
